name: Thomas Surfboards Fin
description: This Fin is what keeps you flying threw the section and holds you in on critical nose rides. We have been using this outline for some time now and we have teamed up with Alkali Fins to create this amazing fin. 100% Hand made in Australia .  Available in 10.5, 11" and 11.5 inch

name: Captain Sip Sop's "Razor Sharp" 5 Panel Cap
description: The "razor sharp" 5 panel is the go to hat for those bad hair days that we all dread. The classic silhouette and timeless colour way speaks of the haircuts we enjoy doing the most… you cant beat the classics!

name: Sip Sop's Tea Party Tee (White)
description: Its a Tea Tee, the small talk will be about your Tee at the Tea Parties

name: Thomas Trucker Cap
description: Not just another printed trucker cap. We designed this thing from the bottom up. Its all in the detail with superior shape and fit. We added coloured rope, button and snap back to give it a little style, and printed "respect your mum" on the interior taping just to remind you your mum is a special lady.

name: Respect Your Mum (Grey)
description:
Blatantly good looking, plain with much gain

- Thomas Respect Your Mum Black Logo
- Small logo on front, Blown up on back

name: Thomas x Deus Colab Trucker Cap (White/ Navy Blue) (One Size)
description: Thomas Surfboards, Shaped, Rattled & Rolled at the Deus Temple Of Enthusiasm. Trucker Cap.

name: Colab Tee (Navy Blue)
description: Thomas Surfboards and Sip Sop's bring you this good looking tee with their cola logo (small on front, large on back)

name: Hand Shaped Paulownia Hand Plane
description:
Summer time fun. Shore-break of fury conquerors, these hand plains are made from paulownia wood and etched with fire. 

Take me to the beach with your flippers and I am certain to leave a smile from ear to ear. 

Hand Shaped by Thomas himself, each comes with its very own tailored   sock! (Colours of socks may differ from photo)

name: Thomas Surfboards Old Faithful
description:
This is what I've personally been stoked on for years. Inspired from the mid sixties and refined at the points, the Old Faithful is the quintessential log.   It has the smoothest of rockers and the rolled concave-less bottom will help you trim like nothing else while perched on the nose through the hollowest of peelers
Dimensions (length, width, thickness,)
Length 9’ to 10’
Width 22 ½” to 23 ¾”
Thickness 2 ½” to 3 ½ 
Recommended Skill Level, Intermediate to advanced, the better you surf the more you will get out of it
Contact for custom orders

name: Captain Sip Sop's Scissor Hands  Tee (Black)
description: Vibe out in our scissor hands tee with 80's inspired turquoise and pink logo's.

name: Thomas 80's Tee (Black)
description:
Get Groovy with our 80's inspired logo, printed with definitive 80's 
Thomas logo (small on front, large on back)

name: Smurf Single NEW
description:
A whippy little number designed to be fun and functional whilst offer performance beyond its looks
Dimensions 
Length 5’5” to 6’6”
Thickness 2 ¼” to 3” 
Width 19” to 22”
The smurf single features a double-ended eggie looking outline and a low rocker throughout. The bottom consist of a ever so slight vee that runs right through that concaves both sides around the fin and under the back foot to provide some extra squirt when pushing it around in the pocket.  Rails lean down the performance shortboard route and keep this board lively, fast driving and a bunch of fun in anything up to overhead waves.
Recommended Skill Level, intermediate to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: New Faithful
description:
The new favourite in the family, a fusion between the old faithful and the deus Harrison Roach concept we build.
Dimensions 
Length 9’0” to 10’
Thickness 2 ½ to 3 ½ 
Width 22 ¼ to 23 ¾” 
Features a plenty with this one, a proven rocker line. An outline that is timeless. Rails that perfectly allow for this board to do everything it is meant too. Slightly upturned 60/40 rails through give that feeling of sitting in the water we associate with boards of old, but don't be confused, the blended nose concave through to subtle rolled panel vee mean that this board will nose ride and trim like nothing else, as well as respond and flow of the tail like a superbike round the isle of Mann.
Recommended Skill Level, beginner to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Mini Hull
description:
Small, fast and something to behold a mini hull will delight the senses
Dimensions 
Length 5’4” to 6’6’
Thickness 2 ¼” to 3 ½” 
Width 20” to 22 ¼” 
The mini hull is the little wild child brother of the hullabaloo.  It shares many of the same features, low rocker, low bladed rails, a hull entry, rolled bottom under its front half, a forward fin and flat tail with the addition of side bites the mini hull will fly down the line but also carve and surf of the rail with speed and drive in excess. Not for the faint hearted, the mini hulls feels like nothing else.
Recommended Skill Level, intermediate to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Leopard
description:
Designed to be one of our most user friendly long boards, to suit those who are looking to get into traditional long boarding with out going straight in the deep end.
Dimensions 
Length 9’0” to 10’
Thickness 2 ½ to 3 ½ 
Width 22 ¼ to 23 ¼ 
Features useability, the medium rocker accompanied with a subtle nose concave through to a flat bottom with the ever so slight amount of rolled vee out the tail means that this board is forgiving while giving the rider the upmost balance of turn, trim and nose riding ability. Often glassed a little lighter than the more traditional model the leopard suits a lot of ladies down to a tee with out forgetting about the fellas that are just getting into long boarding or those that just want a user friendly all-rounder.
Recommended Skill Level, beginner to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Short Mac
description:
Short fast and likes to be pushed, our twist on a performance short board.  A touch shorter and wider than a wct white bread, it Likes to go vertical or into the air at any chance.  Features low soft rails into extra hard between the feet and around the hippy area, a slightly flat deck.  Rocker is Semi low nose but consistently curvy through out. Concave is a deep single from under the chest to out the back
Dimensions 
Length 5’5” to 6’5”
Width 18 ½” to 20”
Thickness 2” to 3”
Recommended Skill Level moderate to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Mid-Length Friend
description:
A super friendly easy rider, from waist high to well over head.  Smooth, clean lines with drive trim and speed. Stupidly easy to ride, but ridicously fun in a whole lot of waves.  A touch of tracker influence with more functionality and surf ability.
Dimensions 
Length 6’8” to 8’10”  
Width 19 ½ ” to 22 ½”
Thickness 2 ½ “ to 3 1/2 
Rounded square, rounded pin or pintail all work well for slightly different feels.
Features 
Soft 50/50 rails up front, through to 60/40 rails through the middle to a downturned rail through the tail.  Super subtle soft hull entry through to a ever so soft single to double concave.  A smoothed out three-stage rocker making it really easy to ride in all kinds of waves. This board is one that can be customised a lot and can change in its characteristics to suit the individual.  Can be set up as a single, 2 + 1 or even a quad.
Recommended Skill Level, from beginner to advanced it offers a smooth, easy fun ride.
Contact for custom orders

name: Postie
description:
The ultimate trim machine, inspired and design for glide. From knee high to double over head, and small day tandem sessions with the babe.
Dimensions 
Length 11 to12’3” 
Width 22 ½ to 24
Thickness 2 ¾ to 4 
Features 
Soft roll through the nose entry to a flatish mid section that slowly leads to a really soft panel vee through the tail, all executed over 12 plus of rail with the upmost subtlety. A 12 inch version of the same mid 60’s greenough Hayden involvement era fin offers the perfect amount of drive and stability. Rocker is smooth and consistent over the entire length of the board.  Just the right amount to offer just the right amount of glide, turnability and nose riding capabilities.
Recommended Skill Level, intermediate to advanced
Contact for custom orders

name: Captain Sip Sop's Scissor Hand's Tee
description: Vibe out in our white scissor hands tee with 80's inspired turquoise and pink logo's.

name: Thomas Surfboards Jai Lee Noserider
description:
Designed with jai lee, after many years of r n d this is what works, a fully-fledged nose rider that also turns quite well of the tail.
Dimensions 
Length 9’2” to 10’
Thickness 2 ½” to 3 ½” 
Width 22 ¼” to 23 ½” 
Features 
50/ 50 rails through the nose flowing back through the board past the wide point where it blends into a tucked edge for the last 12 inches of rail. The deck flutes in the tail allow for extra release for turning of the tail by reducing the volume in the rail.  Fin designed to provide the up most of hold on the nose but still flow through a turn.  Smooth and consistent through out with a touch of flip through the last 12 inches at the tail.  Deep single concave in the nose flowing to flat to a subtle vee out through the tail.
Recommended Skill Level, beginner to advanced 
Contact for custom orders.

name: Thomas Surfboards x Deus x Harrison Roach
description:
Shaped, rattled and rolled at the temple of enthusiasm in Bali under strict supervision by team rider Harrison Roach. 9'3" x 22'3/4" x 2'1/2" in seafoam green resin tint deck and patch with pigment bottom and box fin. 

Also available in 9'2" x 22'3/4" x 2'3/4" in blue resin tint deck and patch with pigment bottom and glassed on fin.

Contact for custom orders

name: Tracker
description:
Inspired by the past, retuned for now and some increased performance.  
Dimensions 
Length 7’ to 8’
Thickness 2 ½ to 3 ½ 
Width 21 ½” to 22 ½” 
The tracker, while being reinvented by modern trends had its place in surfboard evolution as much as it does today.  A flat rockered low railed midlength with a touch of vee and a long flex fin loves to go down the line and be pushed from rail to rail and from top to bottom.  Glide and trim are a feature as well as paddle power and versatility. Points to beachies its not a performance board in the sense but will always preform and pleasure. Recommended in square tail but suits a pin also.
Recommended Skill Level, beginner to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Stringerless
description:
A mid 60’s inspired performance log for the aficionado’s 
Dimensions 
Length 9’2” to 9’9”
Thickness 2 ½ to 3 ½ 
Width 22 ¼ to 23 ¼ 
Features no stringer to start with, increased flex will leave sensations like no other logs, the rolled bottom through out, thinned out 50/50 rails and a flexie fin have this board flying of the bottom and bouncing through turns like crazy. Will offer sensations and abilities on the nose like no other. Ideally suited in waist to head high peeling points the stringerless tips its hat to the past but will also set an example for its modern counter parts. 
Recommended Skill Level, intermediate to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Captain Sip Sop's Tea Party Tee
description: Cross a Barber who loves tea and this is what you get... A stone washed Tea stained shirt with all the tools of the trade in a vibrant tea pot. Who doesn't love a good cuppa!

name: Thomas Surfboards Hullabaloo
description:
It’s all about feeling when it comes to displacements hulls. Its hard thing to put into words, ride one, get it dialled in some nice waves and you will never have as much fun not doing turns.
Dimensions 
Length 6’8” to 8’
Thickness 2 ½ to 3 ½ 
Width 21 ½” to 23” 
Hulls are one of those boards that can be challenging at first, they also can provide feeling of flow and trim that are hard to rival on any other type of surf craft.  Low rockers, rolled through the front half, really low bladed rails and a fin set forward all result in something that loves to be surfed of the front foot down the line, its about rail and drawing things out, feeling it not pushing it.
Recommended Skill Level, intermediate to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

options.name: All boards custom price on application

name: Thomas Surfboards Respect Your Mum Tee Brown
description: Respect your mother with our brown tee with white text.

name: Thomas Surfboards Pocket Tee
description: Stone washed black tee with red plainer logo on breast pocket

name: Thomas Surfboards midlength-semihull
description:
Baby blue pigment deck with white gel-coat circle, vintage orange tint bottom with circle tail patch. 6'5" x 22' x 2'3/4" Single fin (box)

Contact for custom orders

name: Thomas Surfboards Espresso
description:
A performance shortboard hybrid, more width allows for a lot shorter length. This one wants to be pushed around in the pocket in anything from waist high to well overhead, Features low semi boxy rails with a good dose of edge in the aft end.  Rocker has a low entry and medium tail, nice smooth flow to it. Concave is a deep single throughout, 
 Dimensions 
Length 5’3” to 6’6”
Width 2” to 3”
Thickness 18 ¾” to 21”  
Recommended Skill Level, intermediate to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Thomas Surfboards x Captain Sip Sop's Colab Tee (plum/white)
description: Rock the best of both worlds with our collaboration tee in Plum with White text.

name: Thomas Surfboards Penguin
description:
Small, fast, and flighty best describes this short board/fun board hybrid.

Dimensions 
Length 4’10” to 5’10”
Width 19” to 22”
Thickness 2” to 3”
Features an out line that melts, the fish with a spoon with shortboard to come out with something that can appeal to everyone. A medium rocker provides plenty of speed and generous amounts of manoeuvrability, accompanied with a performance shortboard inspired rail and single to double concave that rest in side the chamfer that keeps this little guy so lively. The penguin could be considered our latest and most performance orientated evolution of the Simmons.
Recommended Skill Level, beginner to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Thomas Surfboards x Captain Sip Sop's Colab Tee (olive/red/white)
description: Rock the best of both worlds with our collaboration tee in Olive with Red and White text.

name: Thomas Surfboards Plainer Tee
description: Pay homage to hand shaped craft with our slate black tee with white text bearing our plainer logo.

name: Bonzer Egg
description:
Another take on the bonzer design, think modern single fin egg with a bit extra, 5 fin bonzer or three fin bonzer set up.  Fuller outline than the mini bonzer this guy is a good all rounder for those who like the egg design but seek a little more drive and capability in bigger waves.  Slight single to double concave, Glass on or FCS sides and box centre.  Smooth egg rocker with a little bit of nose lift, loves anything from shoulder high to double over head.

6’ – 7’6” x 19 ½ “- 21 ½” x 2 ½ ” – 3 ½ “
Contact for custom orders

name: Captain Sip Sop's Barber Shop & Outfitters Tee - Orange/Navy
description:
Get Sharp & Stay Great in our Cut Throat Tee.

-Bone cut throat logo front and diamond scissor logo back.
-100% cotton.

name: Piccalo
description:
Small wave peeler chaser and mini beach groveler, Fast responsive and likes to be pushed harder than it looks, Skatie feel with drive and control, a mini Simmons inspired performance board. Features a chamfered, shortboard rail slight s deck, good from above knee to overhead.  Rocker is on the flatter side through out with a hint of kick at the front. Concave is medium to deep single into double through the fins,
Dimensions 
Length 4’10” to 5’5”
Width 20” to 22 ½”
Thickness 2” to 3”
Recommended Skill Level, intermediate to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Love Thy Glasser Tee - White/Black/Red
description:
Glassers have feelings too! Show your appreciation with this tee.

-Love thy glasser text with a small Thomas Surfboards bottle cap logo on front.
-100% cotton.

name: Captain Sip Sop's Barber Shop & Outfitters Tee - Army Green/White
description:
Get Sharp & Stay Great in our Cut Throat Tee.

-Bone cut throat logo front and diamond scissor logo back.
-100% cotton.

name: Thomas Surfboards Hoodie - Burgandy
description:
Stay warm in one of our Thomas Surfboards Hoodies.

- Bottle cap logos front (small) and back (large).
- Front zip.
- Draw string hood.
- Heavy blend 50% cotton 50% polyester.

name: Mini Bronzer
description:
A performance thruster/2 +1, with a good dose of drive and hold and some cambell brothers inspired mini bonzer,  a 3 fin bonzer blending the traditional bonzer with a more 2+1 widow maker style set up, plenty of drive, plenty of hold for some hollow waves, get forward and trim through hollow sections and get over the fins for back foot power surfing.  Single to semi deep double concave, glass on or FCS sides box center fin. 

5’5” – 6’5” x 19” – 21” x 2 ¼ - 3 ¼” 
Contact for custom orders

name: Hug Your Shaper Tee - White/Black/Red
description:
Everybody needs a hug! Support local, hand crafted surfboards with our Hug Your Shaper Tee.

-Hug your shaper logo with small Thomas Surfboards bottle cap logo on front.
-100% cotton.

name: Tugu
description:
The ‘Tugu’, named after a local break in Bali that we spend some time at. It’s a double ender of sorts with a gentle curved rocker. Added to that a subtle concave in the nose that tempers to a smidgen of a roll before finishing out with a panel vee through the tail. Sweet 60/40 rails chart the outline giving away liberal doses of both hold and turn. Features a Single Greenough inspired flex fin, with a touch more tip, good in waves from waist high to well overhead.
Dimensions 
Length 9’ to 10’ 
Width 22” to 23 ½”  
Thickness 2 ½” to 3 ½”	
Recommended Skill Level, Beginner to advanced
Contact for custom orders

name: 80's Thruster
description:
Form and function meet to create something that is as much a look over the shoulder as it is a look into the future.
Dimensions 
Length 5’6” to 6’6’
Thickness 2” to 3” 
Width 18 ½” to 21 ½” 
Our version of the 80’s thruster we feel perfectly blends the best elements of the past and the future.  A medium amount of rocker through the front allows for speed and paddling power while the medium to high tail curve allows for the speed to be maintained whilst feeling responsive.  A deep single concave throughout to a vee of the tail makes this board feel nothing like the retro 80’s slow coach a first glance may leave.  Modern performance rails hidden under the flat deck and bevelled rail provide float paddle power summer slop beater capabilities with out compromising performance.  
Recommended Skill Level, intermediate to advanced 

Contact for custom orders

name: Spoon
description:
Greenough inspired and modelled, if you don’t get it spend some time google-ing the man, performance surfing’s inspiration.
Usually 5 foot long
Features an incredibly time-consuming build process resulting in a truly special craft, something entirely unique.  Built to the highest standards.
Recommended Skill Level, Really advanced knee boarders 
Contact for custom orders

name: Espresso
description:
A performance shortboard hybrid, more width allows for a lot shorter length. This one wants to be pushed around in the pocket in anything from waist high to well overhead, Features low semi boxy rails with a good dose of edge in the aft end.  Rocker has a low entry and medium tail, nice smooth flow to it. Concave is a deep single throughout, 
 Dimensions 
Length 5’3” to 6’6”
Width 2” to 3”
Thickness 18 ¾” to 21”  
Recommended Skill Level, intermediate to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Womens Hug Your Shaper Tee
description:
Everybody needs a hug! Support local, hand crafted surfboards with our Hug Your Shaper Tee.

-Hug your shaper logo with small Thomas Surfboards bottle cap logo on front.
-100% cotton.

name: Thomas Surfboards Hoodie - Grey
description:
Stay warm in one of our Thomas Surfboards Hoodies.

- Bottle cap logos front (small) and back (large).
- Front zip.
- Draw string hood.
- Heavy blend 50% cotton 50% polyester.

name: Jai Lee Noserider
description:
Designed with jai lee, after many years of r n d this is what works, a fully-fledged nose rider that also turns quite well of the tail.
Dimensions 
Length 9’2” to 10’
Thickness 2 ½” to 3 ½” 
Width 22 ¼” to 23 ½” 
Features 
50/ 50 rails through the nose flowing back through the board past the wide point where it blends into a tucked edge for the last 12 inches of rail. The deck flutes in the tail allow for extra release for turning of the tail by reducing the volume in the rail.  Fin designed to provide the up most of hold on the nose but still flow through a turn.  Smooth and consistent through out with a touch of flip through the last 12 inches at the tail.  Deep single concave in the nose flowing to flat to a subtle vee out through the tail.
Recommended Skill Level, beginner to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Vagabond
description:
A modern day interpretation on the twin fin fish we all know and love.
Dimensions 
Length 5’4” to 6’4”
Thickness 2 ¼”to 3” 
Width 19 ½” to 22 ½” 
Features elements of the traditional Lis design twin fish with a bunch of modern performance orientated influences to make it preform to todays standards, low rocker, some concave a more modern rail and you’re off.
Recommended Skill Level, beginner to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Single Fin
description:
Trim, speed and down the line loveliness, the true single fin feel with a little more modernised performance.  Also consider a two plus one setup for touch more modern feel.
Dimensions 
Length 6’2” to 7’6”
Width 18” to 20 ½”
Thickness 2 ¼” to 3 ¼”

Features modernised 70’s inspired down rail, single fin or optional 2 + 1. Suited to head high to well overhead depending on board length.  Rocker is Flatish through out compared to the modern shortboard, enough nose lift to stop it going under, flat enough through the rest to offer plenty of speed.  A relatively Flat bottom through out with a touch single under the chest through to a soft amount of vee double through the tail.
Recommended Skill Level, Intermediate to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: TCSS Model
description: Contact for custom orders

name: Rosie
description:
The rosie d’urso highliner is an all around trim and glide board with the focus on smooth flowing surfing, bottom turn, high line, get to the front and cut back.
This board is something that i’d ride in waist high to double over head, an all rounder that is no better described than just a whole bunch of fun.
Soft rolled hull entry to a subtle subtle bottom roll through the middle into a soft vee in the tail. a 10 greenough to complete the package.
Contact for custom orders

name: Hullabaloo
description:
It’s all about feeling when it comes to displacements hulls. Its hard thing to put into words, ride one, get it dialled in some nice waves and you will never have as much fun not doing turns.
Dimensions 
Length 6’8” to 8’
Thickness 2 ½ to 3 ½ 
Width 21 ½” to 23” 
Hulls are one of those boards that can be challenging at first, they also can provide feeling of flow and trim that are hard to rival on any other type of surf craft.  Low rockers, rolled through the front half, really low bladed rails and a fin set forward all result in something that loves to be surfed of the front foot down the line, its about rail and drawing things out, feeling it not pushing it.
Recommended Skill Level, intermediate to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: The Stepdeck.
description:
The true sidewalk surfer of the collection, if you can’t nose ride this thing maybe think about croquet.
Dimensions 
Length 9’4” to 10’
Thickness 2 ½ to 3 ½ 
Width 22 ¼” to 23 ¾” 
The stepdeck features a wide Californian style template with as its name suggests a noticeable step in the deck. The step reduces volume up front along with increase the amount of flex when standing on the nose, this increased flex allows the board to bend and manipulate its rocker all while your perched on the front of it.  Combine this with a long blended nose concave and some belly down the back the stepdeck in designed to have you standing on the nose as long as possible.
Recommended Skill Level, beginner to advanced 
Contact for custom orders

name: Old Faithful
description:
This is what I've personally been stoked on for years. Inspired from the mid sixties and refined at the points, the Old Faithful is the quintessential log.   It has the smoothest of rockers and the rolled concave-less bottom will help you trim like nothing else while perched on the nose through the hollowest of peelers
Dimensions (length, width, thickness,)
Length 9’ to 10’
Width 22 ½” to 23 ¾”
Thickness 2 ½” to 3 ½ 
Recommended Skill Level, Intermediate to advanced, the better you surf the more you will get out of it

name: SOD Model
description:
The result of 10 years of Little Man (my main test pilot for my boards) logging, Mark has helped come up with this cheeky jivy little hot-dogger. A hippy behind, an upright hatchet fin, this thing loves a tail jam. 

The narrow nose and hefty teardrop concave make lifting out of the lowest deepest pocket nose rides an every day affair. 

Customer order only contact for details

name: Le Nard
description:
A Mini-Simmons inspired pocket trim rocket. Glassed on twin keels right near the behind of a big ol’ chopped square tail. 

With a serious concave of fury and some chinned out rails, this nugget still hooks around on a dime and flies down the line in fashion of a board not becoming of it's size. 

Custom orders only contact for details

name: Thomas Surfboards Hoodie - Purple
description:
Stay warm in one of our Thomas Surfboard Hoodies.

-Bottle cap logos front (small) and back (large).
-Front zip.
-Draw string hood.
-Heavy blend 50% cotton 50% polyester.

name: Thomas Surfboards Hoodie - Green
description:
Stay warm in one of our Thomas Surfboard Hoodies.

-Bottle cap logos front (small) and back (large).
-Front zip.
-Draw string hood.
-Heavy blend 50% cotton 50% polyester.

name: Uppercut Deluxe North Cologne
description: We are extremely proud to present our latest offering to the Uppercut Deluxe range in “North”. A small batch of hand crafted fragrance by master perfumer Jonathon Midgley. Jonathon describes the fragrance as an avant garde green/citrus blend that originated in 1882. Most of the key mens fragrances since the mid 1960s have come from this family with their zesty, masculine blends and woody notes. So in other words women will want you and fish will fear you. Head North!

name: Gift Voucher
description:
Get your mate, bro, cuz, or main man the gift of a Captain Sip Sop's Barber Shop & Outfitters gift voucher and keep them looking sharp!

*Please contact before ordering to determine the value placed on your gift voucher.

name: Uppercut Deluxe - Pocket Comb
description:
Slick it back, pomp it up or just get the knots out with man's other best friend - the pocket comb!

Colour may vary.

name: Uppercut Deluxe Quiff Roller
description: Life getting you down? Need to get more lift in your quiff? Feeling like your hair is a little limp? Need more air in your hair? Well, get ready for lift-off with the new Uppercut Deluxe Quiff Roller.

name: Uppercut Deluxe - Conditioner
description: Follow up a shampoo with this conditioning treatment that will restore your hair to its former glory, restoring body to make it more manageable.

name: Uppercut Deluxe - Shampoo
description: While your lady might argue otherwise, one product is all you need to do the job. The all-in-one shampoo and body wash is laced with peppermint extract for an energising boost and is gentle enough to use daily (yes, you should be showering that frequently).

name: Uppercut Deluxe - Aftershave Moisturiser
description:
Description: For you fellas rocking a short crop, this all-rounder is for you. Perfect as a daily moisturiser, the lotion nourishes the skin, minimises oiliness and reduces the appearance of large pores. Throw in the benefit of sunscreen to protect your dome and you have a product that leaves a no sheen, no fuss, matt finish. It’s non-greasy, non-sticky and will absorb immediately.

Size: 100ml.

Directions for use: Apply generously to clean, dry skin on your head and face. Rub in thoroughly to achieve matt finish. Use morning and evening for optimal results.

name: Uppercut Deluxe - Shave Cream
description:
Willy O’Shea drove into old Sydney town after years on the road with the Jimmy Sharman boxing troupe. The Great Depression had lifted and it was time to settle. First job on the list was a shave and a haircut before he started looking for a job and a pretty lady. He strolled out of the Barbershop feeling like a million bucks.

With that feeling in mind we are pleased to introduce to you our deluxe lemongrass Shave Cream. Made for the common man who wants to step it up a notch. Contains Menthol for cooling and Coconut oil to aid in blemish control for a clean finish. Can also be used with a shaving brush for ultimate lather.

name: Uppercut Deluxe - Monster Hold
description: For those who like it real strong we present to you our Monster Hold pomade. Extra powerful, sweat resistant and great for all styles.

name: Uppercut Deluxe - Pomade
description: Uppercut Deluxe Pomade is a water-soluble product suitable for a diverse range of styles but particularly popular with fellas rocking a slickback, quiff or mohawk. Its unique formula means it will wash out easily leaving no residue. The Pomade gives control and definition without the weight of traditional pomades with a slightly glossy finish.

name: Uppercut Deluxe - Matt Clay
description: Uppercut Deluxe Matt Clay makes it easy to achieve a no-fuss messy look. Don’t let the thick consistency fool you, the clay does what you tell it to, effortlessly piecing out hair to give a pliable, re-workable style.

name: Uppercut Deluxe - Featherweight
description: Don’t be fooled by the name, just because this wax is light doesn’t mean it can’t pack a punch. Featherweight has plenty of tack and dry finish for a natural looking hold. Great for messy quiffs and textured styles. Another great feature with this product is that it’s water soluble which means you get a great dry look without any build up or residue. Without a doubt the great all rounder.

name: Uppercut Deluxe Soap
description: Uppercut Deluxe Soap is specially formulate to be Unfragranced and made with Goat's milk and Oatmeal to gently exfoliate and cleanse your skin. It all natural and contains tested and approved ingredients.

name: Mo Wax
description: Movember is here, so get prepared to sport a sharp mo with our Movember and Sons Mo Wax collab. A little dab of this stuff will keep your mo ship shape and might even persuade you to sport a mo all year round.
